mdx.excerpt: My last personal blog post was titled  Depresso . It described how I was getting back into the hobby of home espresso, and concluded: I'm excited. This has not been without its frustrations, but it's been fun. I'm excited for it, and I'm excited to be excited about anything, honestly. I'm still excited. It's been a…

prev.excerpt: Dear mastodon.technology community, I have sad news that I have decided to shut down the mastodon.technology instance. In accordance with the  Mastodon Server Covenant , the server will be shut down no earlier than December 1, 2022. The server is…
